about.name: Martin O
about.role: Full-Stack Developer specializing in Node.js, Express & Secure Web Applications
about.heroDescription: Professional web developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable, secure web applications using modern JavaScript technologies. Expert in Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, MongoDB, and RESTful API development.
about.bio: I'm a passionate full-stack web developer with over 2 years of experience building robust web applications. My expertise lies in creating secure, scalable solutions using modern technologies. I specialize in Express.js, EJS templating, and implementing secure authentication systems with bcrypt. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices for web development. When I'm not coding, I enjoy contributing to open-source projects, writing technical blogs, and exploring new technologies in the web development ecosystem.
